      • errorMembership

        public double errorMembership(WB_Coord sample)

        The membership error for a sample. If the error is less than a threshold then it can be considered a member. The threshold's value depends on the data set.

        The error is computed by projecting the sample into eigenspace then projecting it back into sample space and

        Parameters:
        sample - The sample whose membership status is being considered.
        Returns:
        Its membership error.

      • response

        public double response(WB_Coord sample)
        Computes the dot product of each basis vector against the sample. Can be used as a measure for membership in the training sample set. High values correspond to a better fit.
        Parameters:
        sample - Sample of original data.
        Returns:
        Higher value indicates it is more likely to be a member of input dataset.
